body_html: @jiqiujia, I previously have the same problem. Later, I found that the local variables need to be initialized before any session starts; sometimes, the starting may be hidden in some other functions. In my case, it was "tf.train.start_queue_runners()"; when I put the initialization before that call, it will work well. Otherwise, there will be the same error as in your post. Hope it may help.

body: @jiqiujia, I previously have the same problem. Later, I found that the local variables need to be initialized before any session starts; sometimes, the starting may be hidden in some other functions. In my case, it was "tf.train.start_queue_runners()"; when I put the initialization before that call, it will work well. Otherwise, there will be the same error as in your post. Hope it may help.
